name: No Legs? No Problem!
description:
COUCH MULTIPLAYER CHAOS

Race your friends in lightning-fast rounds of cute racing battles for up to 4 players. Perfect for parties!

ABILITIES

Discover different ways to use your abilities, sometimes using your freeze on your teammate can be more usefull than using it on your enemy.

SIMPLE CONTROLS

It only takes a stick and some buttons to leave your enemies in the dust. Anyone can play immediately, but hardcore players will love mastering the controls to be a true legend of the game.

OVER 16 STAGES

Race through the elements of the world in 16 race tracks, each filled with different obstacles, fire, sandstoms, shurikens you name it. Jump over giant gaps to reach the finish line.

TEAM UP

You can also play teams to work together and beat you friends. Which team is the best? Race to find out.

MEET THE CREW
